VEvil.​GameLogic.​Interactable.​TNT.​TNTInteractable
VEvil.​GameLogic.​Interactable.​APointerClickableEntity
public sealed
VEvil.​GameLogic.​Interactable.​TNT.​TNTInteractable

The main logic for the TNT Interactable entity available throughout the levels.

This component require a TeamIndicator component in order to work.

Variables
explosionVFX
[Header("TNT Interactable - References")]
[SerializeField, Tooltip("The GameObject supposed to contain and play the TNT explosion's VFX (Optional).")]
private GameObject explosionVFX
onExplosionTimerStartedEditor
[Header("TNT Interactable - Events")]
[SerializeField, Tooltip("Invoked when the timer for this TNT to explode is about to begin.\nArg 01: The time before the explosion.\nWon't be invoked if no delay has been set!")]
private UnityEvent<float> onExplosionTimerStartedEditor
onExplosionEditor
[SerializeField, Tooltip("Invoked when this TNT has exploded.\nArg 01: The number of entities that took damages.")]
private UnityEvent<int> onExplosionEditor
teamIndicator
private TeamIndicator teamIndicator

The TeamIndicator component indicating the target ETeamType fo this TNTInteractable.

onExplosionTimerStarted
private Action<float> onExplosionTimerStarted

Invoked when the timer for this TNTInteractable to explode is about to begin.

Won't be invoked if no delay in the Settings has been set!

Parameter
Arg 01

The time before the explosion

onExplosion
private Action<int> onExplosion

Invoked when this TNTInteractable has exploded.

Parameter
Arg 01

The number of AHealthModules that took damages.

OnPointerClick
protected override void OnPointerClick()
FindAttackableEntities
private List<AHealthModule> FindAttackableEntities()

Find AHealthModules in the TNTInteractableSettings.ExplosionRange while respecting the TNTInteractableSettings.FriendlyFire flag and return the results as a List{AHealthModule}.

AttackModules
private void AttackModules()

Attack the AHealthModule detected and sorted in the FindAttackableEntities method.
